original_title: Oscar De La Hoya vs. Félix Trinidad
overview: Félix Trinidad vs. Oscar De La Hoya, billed as The Fight of the Millennium, was a boxing match held at the Mandalay Bay Events Center on the Las Vegas Strip on September 18, 1999, to unify the WBC and IBF's world Welterweight championships.
title: Oscar De La Hoya vs. Félix Trinidad
